description: 选择器组件，形式是弹起的浮层。

descriptionTags.en: The selector component, in the form of a popup layer.
descriptionTags.name: 选择器

data.description:
数据源，非级联时data数组的长度决定picker列数，级联时以cols决定 pick列数
@en Data source, the length of the data list determines the number of picker columns when not cascading, and is determined by cols when cascading
data.name: data

tags.en: Data source, the length of the data list determines the number of picker columns when not cascading, and is determined by cols when cascading

data.descWithTags: 数据源，非级联时data数组的长度决定picker列数，级联时以cols决定 pick列数

cascade.description:
是否联动
@en Whether to cascade
cascade.name: cascade

cols.description:
列数(最大为5；cascade=true时才使用)
@en Number of columns (maximum 5; only used when cascade=true)
cols.name: cols

tags.en: Number of columns (maximum 5; only used when cascade=true)

rows.description:
行数(一列可选项的行数)，必须是奇数，最小为3个
@en The number of rows (the number of rows in a column of optional items), must be an odd number, the minimum is 3
rows.name: rows

tags.en: The number of rows (the number of rows in a column of optional items), must be an odd number, the minimum is 3

rows.descWithTags: 行数(一列可选项的行数)，必须是奇数，最小为3个

disabled.description:
是否不可用
@en Whether t be disabled
disabled.name: disabled

value.description:
值, 格式是[value1, value2, value3], 对应数据源的相应级层value，如果不传默认选每一列的第一个值
@en Value, the format is [value1, value2, value3], corresponding to the corresponding level value of the data source, if not passed, the first value of each column is selected by default
value.name: value

tags.en: Value, the format is [value1, value2, value3], corresponding to the corresponding level value of the data source, if not passed, the first value of each column is selected by default

value.descWithTags: 值, 格式是[value1, value2, value3], 对应数据源的相应级层value，如果不传默认选每一列的第一个值

onHide.description:
点击遮罩层或取消、确定按钮的隐藏回调
@en Callback for clicking on mask layer or cancel button, OK button
onHide.name: onHide

tags.en: Callback for clicking on mask layer or cancel button, OK button

onHide.descWithTags: 点击遮罩层或取消、确定按钮的隐藏回调

onChange.description:
选中后的回调
@en Callback after selection
onChange.name: onChange

onPickerChange.description:
每列数据选择变化后的回调函数
@en The callback after each column data selection changes
onPickerChange.name: onPickerChange

tags.en: The callback after each column data selection changes

onPickerChange.descWithTags: 每列数据选择变化后的回调函数

itemStyle.description:
每列样式
@en Stylesheet per column
itemStyle.name: itemStyle

visible.description:
是否展示选择器
@en whether to show the picker
visible.name: visible

okText.name: okText

tags.en: Text of confirmed selected value of the popup

okText.descWithTags: 弹窗确认已选值的文案

dismissText.name: dismissText

onOk.description:
点击选中时执行的回调
@en Callback when clicking on Ok
onOk.name: onOk
onOk.descWithTags: 点击选中时执行的回调

onDismiss.description:
点击取消时执行的回调
@en Callback when clicking to cancel
onDismiss.name: onDismiss
onDismiss.descWithTags: 点击取消时执行的回调

clickable.description:
是否可通过点击操作选择内容
@en Whether content can be selected by clicking
clickable.name: clickable

tags.en: Whether content can be selected by clicking

clickable.descWithTags: 是否可通过点击操作选择内容

hideEmptyCols.description:
是否隐藏无数据的空列，常用于级联选择
@en Whether to hide empty columns without data, often used for cascading selection
hideEmptyCols.name: hideEmptyCols

tags.en: Whether to hide empty columns without data, often used for cascading selection

hideEmptyCols.descWithTags: 是否隐藏无数据的空列，常用于级联选择

maskClosable.description:
点击蒙层是否关闭菜单
@en Whether to click the mask to close the menu
maskClosable.name: maskClosable

tags.en: Whether to click the mask to close the menu

maskClosable.descWithTags: 点击蒙层是否关闭菜单

touchToStop.description:
是否通过长按停止滑动，传入数字 x 表示触摸超过 x 毫秒算长按，传 true 表示 x=100，长按事件与 click 事件互斥
@en Whether to stop sliding by long-pressing, inputing in the number x means that the touch exceeds x milliseconds to count as long-pressing, inputing true means that x=100, the long-press event and the click event are mutually exclusive
touchToStop.name: touchToStop

tags.en: Whether to stop sliding by long-pressing, inputing in the number x means that the touch exceeds x milliseconds to count as long-pressing, inputing true means that x=100, the long-press event and the click event are mutually exclusive

touchToStop.descWithTags: 是否通过长按停止滑动，传入数字 x 表示触摸超过 x 毫秒算长按，传 true 表示 x=100，长按事件与 click 事件互斥

gestureOutOfControl.description:
是否禁用滚动容器手势判断，禁用后交给业务方自己判断
@en Whether to disable the scrolling container gesture judgment, leave it to users to judge
gestureOutOfControl.name: gestureOutOfControl

tags.en: Whether to disable the scrolling container gesture judgment, leave it to users to judge

gestureOutOfControl.descWithTags: 是否禁用滚动容器手势判断，禁用后交给业务方自己判断

needBottomOffset.description:
从底部滑出的菜单内容是否适配ipx底部
@en Whether the content of the menu that slides out from the bottom fits the bottom of ipx
needBottomOffset.name: needBottomOffset

tags.en: Whether the content of the menu that slides out from the bottom fits the bottom of ipx

needBottomOffset.descWithTags: 从底部滑出的菜单内容是否适配ipx底部

translateZ.name: translateZ

tags.en: [To be deprecated] Enable translateZ forced promotion

translateZ.descWithTags: [即将废弃] 开启translateZ强制提升

maskTransitionTimeout.description:
菜单蒙层动画时长
@en Menu mask animation duration
maskTransitionTimeout.name: maskTransitionTimeout

type.name: number | { appear?: number; enter?: number; exit?: number; }

contentTransitionTimeout.description:
菜单内容动画时长
@en Menu content animation duration
contentTransitionTimeout.name: contentTransitionTimeout

type.name: number | { appear?: number; enter?: number; exit?: number; }

contentTransitionType.description:
内容过渡动画类名
@en Content transition animation classname
contentTransitionType.name: contentTransitionType

maskClass.description:
自定义蒙层类名
@en Custom mask classname
maskClass.name: maskClass

maskStyle.description:
自定义蒙层样式
@en Custom mask stylesheet
maskStyle.name: maskStyle

contentClass.description:
自定义内容类名
@en Custom content classname
contentClass.name: contentClass

contentStyle.description:
自定义内容样式
@en Custom content stylesheet
contentStyle.name: contentStyle

maskTransitionType.description:
蒙层过渡动画类名
@en Mask transition animation classname
maskTransitionType.name: maskTransitionType

animatingClosable.description:
执行进场动画时点击蒙层是否可关闭菜单
@en Whether the menu can be closed by clicking on the mask when performing the entry animation
animatingClosable.name: animatingClosable

tags.en: Whether the menu can be closed by clicking on the mask when performing the entry animation

animatingClosable.descWithTags: 执行进场动画时点击蒙层是否可关闭菜单

mountOnEnter.description:
是否在打开菜单时再加载内容
@en Whether to reload content when the menu is opened
mountOnEnter.name: mountOnEnter

tags.en: Whether to reload content when the menu is opened

mountOnEnter.descWithTags: 是否在打开菜单时再加载内容

unmountOnExit.description:
是否在退出时卸载内容
@en Whether to unmount content on exit
unmountOnExit.name: unmountOnExit

tags.en: Whether to unmount content on exit

unmountOnExit.descWithTags: 是否在退出时卸载内容

preventBodyScroll.description:
弹窗打开时是否禁止body的滚动
@en Whether to prohibit the scrolling of the body when the popup is opened
preventBodyScroll.name: preventBodyScroll

tags.en: Whether to prohibit the scrolling of the body when the popup is opened

preventBodyScroll.descWithTags: 弹窗打开时是否禁止body的滚动

defaultValue.value: 第一个全屏组件（弹窗、toast等）打开时页面overflow值

initialBodyOverflow.name: initialBodyOverflow

tags.en: The initial overflow state of the page, that is, the state in which overflow should be restored when the popup is closed
tags.default: 第一个全屏组件（弹窗、toast等）打开时页面overflow值
tags.default_en: The page overflow value when the first fullscreen component (popup, toast, etc.) is opened

initialBodyOverflow.descWithTags: 页面初始 overflow 状态，即关闭弹窗时 overflow 应该还原的状态

onClose.description:
关闭后回调（动画执行完毕）
@en Callback after closing (animation is completed)
onClose.name: onClose
onClose.descWithTags: 关闭后回调（动画执行完毕）

onOpen.description:
打开后回调（动画执行完毕）
@en Callback after opening (animation is completed)
onOpen.name: onOpen
onOpen.descWithTags: 打开后回调（动画执行完毕）

onMaskClick.description:
点击蒙层回调，maskClosable=false时也会触发
@en Callback when clicking the mask , also triggered when maskClosable=false
onMaskClick.name: onMaskClick

tags.en: Callback when clicking the mask , also triggered when maskClosable=false

onMaskClick.descWithTags: 点击蒙层回调，maskClosable=false时也会触发

onTouchMove.description:
弹窗的touchmove回调
@en Touch event callbacks for masking
onTouchMove.name: onTouchMove

onPreventTouchMove.description:
非滚动区域或滚动到顶部及底部时的触摸事件回调
@en Touch event callbacks for non-scrolling areas or when scrolling to the top and bottom
onPreventTouchMove.name: onPreventTouchMove

tags.en: Touch event callbacks for non-scrolling areas or when scrolling to the top and bottom

onPreventTouchMove.descWithTags: 非滚动区域或滚动到顶部及底部时的触摸事件回调

getContainer.description:
获取挂载容器
@en Get mounted container
getContainer.name: getContainer

value.description:
每一列展示的每项文案对应的值
@en The value for each item displayed in each column

tags.en: The value for each item displayed in each column

value.descWithTags: 每一列展示的每项文案对应的值

label.description:
每一列展示的文案
@en Text displayed in each column

级联状态下，该列对应的下一列数据

最外层元素 DOM
@en The outermost element DOM

每一列的滑动状态
@en Sliding state of each column

updateLayout.description:
手动更新元素布局
@en Manually update the element layout

getAllColumnValues.description:
获取所有列的值
@en Get all column values

获取第 n 列的值
@en Get the value of the nth column

scrollToCurrentIndex.name: scrollToCurrentIndex
scrollToCurrentIndex.description:
直接跳到当前最近一行（调用时将中断滚动）
@en Jump directly to the current most recent line (will break scrolling when called)

scrollToCurrentIndex.descWithTags: 直接跳到当前最近一行（调用时将中断滚动）
